item.description:
Start your 4th of July week off CORRECT by coming to chill on the patio at Battery Park this coming Sunday.  Battery Park's "Back to the Patio" with DJ Doze and DJ Frank White spinning the tunes. Old skool hip hop and R&B.

We stopped in here this past Sunday and the music was awesome! The patio is a good size space and almost empty!! Plenty o' room to party and socialize, etc.  We had a great time!

Battery Park is located in the Financial District in Boston.  It's near State St (Orange and Blue Lines), Downtown Crossing (Orange and Red) and a short walk to Park Street or Gov't Ctr (Green Line).  Street parking is available and FREE on Sundays in Boston.  There are also a couple of pay garages nearby.

Everyone is responsible for their own food and drink. SO PLEASE MAINTAIN A SEPARATE TAB OR PAY AS YOU GO!

Let's take over this patio! Good eats, good music, and good friends! COME ON DOWN!

=========================================

UPDATE: 6/28/2012. Don't forget that the Chowderfest is happening on Sunday also. Come out early and head over to City Hall before this event and grab you some yummy chowdah! 11am-6pm.  http://www.bostonharborfest.com/chowderfest.html.
item.how_to_find_us: Will be on patio. I look like my picture, or just ask the hostess who I am.
item.name: SUNDAY FUNDAY Independence Week KICKOFF!
